title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.7 - Notification as to refunds and exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.7 - Notification as to refunds and exemptions

State Regulations

The commissioner of finance agrees to notify the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles of those registrants of whom he disapproves for
refunds or exemptions of the tax. The commissioner of finance further agrees
that said notification shall be sent to the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles
within 90 days from the date of such determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
19.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
